00019     void MultiParticleGunPrimaryGenerator::GeneratePrimaryVertex(G4Event* anEvent) {
00020 
00021         int cur_mpg_pdgid = mpgPdgID_;
00022         G4ThreeVector cur_mpg_vertex = mpgVertex_;
00023         G4ThreeVector cur_mpg_momentum = mpgMomentum_;
00024 
00025         // current number of vertices in the event! 
00026         int curNVertices = anEvent->GetNumberOfPrimaryVertex();
00027 
00028         double nInteractionsInput = mpgNParticles_;
00029         int nInteractions = nInteractionsInput;
00030         if (mpgEnablePoisson_){ 
00031             nInteractions = 0;
00032             while (nInteractions == 0){ // keep generating a random poisson until > 0, no point in generator 0 vertices...
00033                 nInteractions = random_->Poisson(nInteractionsInput);
00034             }
00035         }
00036 
00037         // make a for loop
00038         for (int i = 0; i < (nInteractions-curNVertices); ++i) {
00039 
00040             G4PrimaryVertex* curvertex = new G4PrimaryVertex(cur_mpg_vertex,0.); //second input is t0
00041             // curvertex->SetPosition(0. * mm,0. * mm,-10. * mm);
00042             curvertex->SetWeight(1.);
00043             
00044             G4PrimaryParticle* primary = new G4PrimaryParticle(cur_mpg_pdgid,cur_mpg_momentum.x(),cur_mpg_momentum.y(),cur_mpg_momentum.z());
00045 
00046             UserPrimaryParticleInformation* primaryInfo = new UserPrimaryParticleInformation();
00047             primaryInfo->setHepEvtStatus(1.);
00048             primary->SetUserInformation(primaryInfo);
00049 
00050             curvertex->SetPrimary(primary);    
00051             anEvent->AddPrimaryVertex(curvertex);
00052 
00053         }      
00054     }
00055 }
